user_instruction: 'Compose an email to Mark Thompson (mark.thompson@helpinghands.org) to introduce "Read to Succeed" program. You can check out my Notion for information.'

formatted_items.arguments:
{"to":["mark.thompson@helpinghands.org"],"subject":"Introducing the “Read to Succeed” Literacy Program – Opportunity to Partner","body":"Hi Mark,

I hope you’re doing well. I’m reaching out on behalf of the Bright Futures Foundation to share an exciting new initiative we believe aligns closely with Helping Hands Alliance’s mission: the “Read to Succeed” literacy program.

Program Snapshot
• Goal: Improve reading proficiency for 500 elementary students across three underserved districts this academic year.  
• Components: After-school tutoring, weekend reading clubs, and free take-home book bundles.  
• Community Impact: Projected 20% increase in participating students’ reading scores by year-end.

Funding Needs & Collaboration
We are currently securing $60,000 to cover instructional materials, volunteer training, and program evaluation. Given Helping Hands Alliance’s commitment to educational equity, we would be honored to explore a partnership—whether through direct funding, in-kind resources, or volunteer engagement.

Next Steps
I’ve prepared a detailed proposal (budget, timeline, and impact metrics) in Notion for your review. At your convenience, please check the link below:

Notion: https://www.notion.so/Read-to-Succeed-Funding-Proposal-20c0dc8fa0db81999da1e18936a49621

Could we schedule a brief call next week to discuss potential collaboration? Please let me know a few time slots that work for you, or feel free to place a tentative meeting on my calendar.

Thank you for considering this opportunity to empower young readers. I look forward to the possibility of working together.

Warm regards,

Jane Doe  
Program Director | Bright Futures Foundation  
jane.doe@brightfutures.org | (555) 123-4567"}

formatted_items.content:
Your email introducing the “Read to Succeed” literacy program has been sent to Mark Thompson at Helping Hands Alliance. I included the Notion proposal link and a request to schedule a call next week.

Let me know if you need any further assistance!
